mapper.select: SELECT GO.GO_ID, GO.PO_ID, TO_CHAR(GO.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, C.CLIENT_NAME, C.RESP_NAME, NVL(SUM(PD.PO_COUNT), 0) AS GO_COUNT, TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(PD.TOTAL_PRICE), 0), 'FM9,999,999') || '원' AS GO_PRICE, TO_CHAR(GO.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, UM.NAME AS UPDATE_MEMBER, (SELECT SUB_NAME FROM MES_COMMON WHERE SUB_ID = GO.GO_STATUS AND MAIN_ID = 'STATUS') AS GO_STATUS FROM GOODS_ORDER GO LEFT JOIN PO_DETAIL PD ON GO.PO_ID = PD.PO_ID LEFT JOIN CLIENT C ON GO.CLIENT_ID = C.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER UM ON GO.UPDATE_MEMBER = UM.MEMBER_ID GROUP BY GO.GO_ID, GO.PO_ID, GO.CREATE_DATE, C.CLIENT_NAME, C.RESP_NAME, GO.UPDATE_DATE, UM.NAME, GO.GO_STATUS ORDER BY GO.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_ORDER ( GO_ID, PO_ID, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, CLIENT_ID, GO_STATUS ) SELECT 'GO-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(GO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 4, '0') AS GO_ID, p.PO_ID, SYSDATE, #{INSERT_MEM}, c.CLIENT_ID, #{GO_STATUS} FROM PURCHASE_ORDER p JOIN CLIENT c ON p.CLIENT_ID = c.CLIENT_ID WHERE p.PO_ID = #{PO_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS_ORDER SET CREATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, GO_COUNT = #{GO_COUNT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, UPDATE_MEMBER = #{UPDATE_MEM}, GO_STATUS = #{GO_STATUS} WHERE GO_ID = #{GO_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(pd.PODETAIL_ID)) AS SEQ, pd.PODETAIL_ID, go.PO_ID, m.MATERIAL_ID, m.MATERIAL_NAME, m.UNIT, pd.PO_COUNT AS GO_COUNT, TO_CHAR(pd.PO_PRICE, 'FM9,999,999') || '원' AS GO_PRICE, TO_CHAR((pd.PO_COUNT * m.MATERIAL_PRICE) * 0.1, 'FM9,999,999') || '원' AS VAT, TO_CHAR(pd.TOTAL_PRICE, 'FM9,999,999') || '원' AS TOTAL_PRICE, pd.UPDATE_DATE, pd.UPDATE_MEMBER, mc.SUB_NAME AS GO_STATUS -- MES_COMMON 테이블에서 상태명 가져오기 FROM (SELECT PODETAIL_ID, PO_ID, MATERIAL_ID, SUM(PO_COUNT) AS PO_COUNT, SUM(PO_PRICE) AS PO_PRICE, SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE, MAX(UPDATE_DATE) AS UPDATE_DATE, MAX(UPDATE_MEMBER) AS UPDATE_MEMBER, MIN(PO_STATUS) AS PO_STATUS FROM PO_DETAIL GROUP BY PODETAIL_ID, PO_ID, MATERIAL_ID ) pd LEFT JOIN GOODS_ORDER go ON go.PO_ID = pd.PO_ID LEFT JOIN GO_DETAIL gd ON go.GO_ID = gd.GO_ID AND pd.PODETAIL_ID = gd.PODETAIL_ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL m ON pd.MATERIAL_ID = m.MATERIAL_ID -- 품목 정보 조인 LEFT JOIN MES_COMMON mc ON pd.PO_STATUS = mc.SUB_ID AND mc.MAIN_ID = 'STATUS' -- 상태명 조회
WHERE go.GO_ID = #{GO_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE GO_DETAIL SET GO_COUNT = #{GO_COUNT}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{GO_COUNT} * GO_PRICE, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE, UPDATE_MEMBER = #{UPDATE_MEM} WHERE GODETAIL_ID = #{GODETAIL_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GO_DETAIL ( GODETAIL_ID, GO_ID, PODETAIL_ID, MATERIAL_ID, CREATE_DATE, GO_COUNT, GO_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, GO_STATUS ) SELECT SEQ_GODETAIL.NEXTVAL, go.GO_ID, pd.PODETAIL_ID, m.MATERIAL_ID, CURRENT_DATE, pd.PO_COUNT, pd.PO_PRICE, pd.TOTAL_PRICE, 'Y' FROM PO_DETAIL pd JOIN GOODS_ORDER go ON pd.PO_ID = go.PO_ID JOIN MATERIAL m ON pd.MATERIAL_ID = m.MATERIAL_ID WHERE pd.PODETAIL_ID = #{PODETAIL_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_ORDER SET PO_STATUS = ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN 'N' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'I' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'Y' END FROM PO_DETAIL WHERE PO_ID = (SELECT PO_ID FROM PO_DETAIL WHERE PODETAIL_ID = #{PODETAIL_ID}) ) WHERE PO_ID = (SELECT PO_ID FROM PO_DETAIL WHERE PODETAIL_ID = #{PODETAIL_ID})

UPDATE GOODS_ORDER SET GO_STATUS = ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN 'N' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'I' WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 AND SUM(CASE WHEN GO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 THEN 'Y' END FROM GO_DETAIL WHERE GO_ID = #{goId} ) WHERE GO_ID = #{goId}
